item.title: Migration 3 to 4
item.description: FundsXML3 to FundsXML4 update path FundsXML 4.0.0 is the first version since the beginning of FundsXML (2001) that was not backward compatible. This chapter contains information about the major differences between version FundsXML 3.0.6 and FundsXML 4.0.0. Note: not all Nodes will be covered in detail. Only the most different ones. The main differences are: clear separation between fund and sharecalss data (including holdings) more mandatory fields (especially for OTC instruments) more focus on issuer/counterparty data enhanced reference data check (e.
